accordion.description1:
In a bowl, mix together the curry powder, cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt, and black pepper.

Add the chicken and toss to coat evenly...
accordion.description2:
Cook the macaroni pasta according to package instructions until al dente.

Drain and set aside ...
